description: Returns a paginated list of all policy templates in the specified policy store.

parameters.name: policyStoreId
parameters.description: Specifies the ID of the policy store that contains the policy templates you want to list.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Specifies the total number of results that you want included in each response. If additional items exist beyond the number you specify, the NextToken response element is returned with a value (not null). Include the specified value as the NextToken request parameter in the next call to the operation to get the next set of results. Note that the service might return fewer results than the maximum even when there are more results available. You should check NextToken after every operation to ensure that you receive all of the results. If you do not specify this parameter, the operation defaults to 10 policy templates per response. You can specify a maximum of 50 policy templates per response.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If present, this value indicates that more output is available than is included in the current response. Use this value in the NextToken request parameter in a subsequent call to the operation to get the next part of the output. You should repeat this until the NextToken response element comes back as null. This indicates that this is the last page of results.

nested_items.name: policyTemplates
nested_items.description: The list of the policy templates in the specified policy store.

nested_items.name: policyStoreId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the policy store that contains the template.

nested_items.name: policyTemplateId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the policy template.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description attached to the policy template.

nested_items.name: createdDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that the policy template was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that the policy template was most recently updated.
